$M = \frac{1}{6500} M_{E}$ dan $R = \frac{1}{13} R_{E}$

\begin{eqnarray*}\frac{g}{g_{E}} &=& \frac{\frac{GM}{R^2}}{\frac{GM_{E}}{R_{E}^2}} = \frac{M}{M_{E}} \left( \frac{R_{E}}{R} \right)^{2}\\\frac{g}{g_{E}} &=& \frac{1}{6500} 13^{2}\\g &=& 0.026 g_{E} \quad \text{atau} \quad \text{38.46 kali lebih kecil.}\\\end{eqnarray*}
